alert.note: Alert for Clark; Codington; Day; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 1:15AM MDT until May 30 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Roberts County in northeastern South Dakota... Day County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Clark County in northeastern South Dakota... Northwestern Codington County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 215 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Swan Lake, or 12 miles south of Webster, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Antelope Lake around 225 AM CDT. Webster around 235 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Roslyn and Opitz Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
